Join Us

Postdoctoral and staff positions are available in our group at the Wenzhou Institute, University of Chinese Academy of Science. We are looking for researchers in soft matter physics and rheology.

  1. Directions
    • Simulation: Fluid mechanics of dense suspensions or colloidal gels, modeling for soft matter systems
    • Experiment: rheology and fluid mechanics (suspensions and colloidal gels)
  2. Conditions
    • Salary: see here
    • Term: 2 years
  3. Requirements
    • Doctoral degree in soft matter, statistical physics, fluid mechanics, rheology and biophysics, etc.
  4. Please send the following items to me
    • CV
    • List of publications
